title: ils摔落等自然伤害如何调控到原来那样。
author: Gyzerccc

replies.author: MC_Shenfeng
replies.txt_content:
environmentalDamage:
  block_explosion:(爆炸伤害)
    damage: 0(伤害)
    durabilityLost: 0(装备掉耐久)
  cactus:(仙人掌伤害)
    damage: 0
    durabilityLost: 0
  drowning:(溺水伤害)
    damage: 0
    durabilityLost: 0
  entity_explosion:(火球爆炸伤害)
    damage: 0
    durabilityLost: 0
  fall:(衰落伤害)
    damage: 0
    durabilityLost: 0
  fire:(火焰)
    damage: 1
    durabilityLost: 0
  fire_tick:(烧伤)
    damage: 1
    durabilityLost: 0
  lava:(岩浆)
    damage: 0
    durabilityLost: 0
  lightning:(闪电)
    damage: 0
    durabilityLost: 0
  magic:(**)
    damage: 0
    durabilityLost: 0
  poison:(中毒)
    damage: 2
    durabilityLost: 0
  starvation:(饥饿)
    damage: 10
    durabilityLost: 0
  suffocation:(窒息)
    damage: 0
    durabilityLost: 0
  thorns:(风暴)
    damage: 0
    durabilityLost: 0
  damage:
    durabilityLost: 1
potions:(中毒)
  instantHealthI: 10
  instantHealthII: 30
  splashHealthI: 10
  splashHealthII: 30

这些在ils的config里面都可以配置
望采纳

replies.author: AJ_
replies.txt_content: 把 config 配置文件删除 重启服务器重新生成
